title: Alquiler de dúplex en Llucmajor Interior
description:
Spectacular chalet available for rent, divided into separate big apartments. 
This 160 m² duplex apartment includes 3 spacious bedrooms, and a suite bedroom with a private lounge at the top (penthouse), and 3 fully accessible bathrooms.

Enjoy amenities like air conditioning, a fully-equipped separate kitchen, and access to luxurious shared spaces, including a swimming pool, tennis court, and BBQ area.

Key Features:

3 Bedrooms + 1 bedroomed suite penthouse with Private Lounge
3 Accessible Bathrooms
Air Conditioning in All Rooms
Separate Kitchen
Shared Amenities: Pool, Tennis Court, BBQ Area
Pet-Friendly – pets are welcome!
Ideal for family stays, group vacations, or special events. There’s also the option to rent the entire chalet for added comfort and privacy. For more information and reservations, please contact us.

2 MONTHS DEPOSIT
WATER 110€ APPROX.
WIFI 30€

GARAGE NOT INCLUDED.
